target_column_indexes.description: List of 1-based indices of columns to be imputed.

is_binary.description: List of booleans per target column indicating binary (true) or continuous (false). Order aligns with target_column_indexes.

iteration_before_first_imputation.description: Iterations to run before the first imputation round.

iteration_between_imputations.description: Iterations to run between subsequent imputations.
